svcproc.title: Minor Front Wheel Alignment
svcproc.para: Perform a minor front wheel alignment for all normal maintenance conditions.
Perform the minor front wheel alignment in the following sequence:

step1.para: Inspect all the systems that affect the wheel alignment. Refer to Inspection Before Alignment in this section.
Check and adjust the wheel bearings or wheel bearing end play for the truck hub unit.
